name: seven
semantic_context: Send SMS and make text-to-speech calls
natural_language_description: 这是 seven 节点。主要用于: Send SMS and make text-to-speech calls

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: sms

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: send
available_options: Send (值: send) - Converts text to voice and calls a given number

from.name: from
from.description: The caller ID displayed in the receivers display. Max 16 numeric or 11 alphanumeric characters.
from.natural_language_description: 参数名: From | 作用: The caller ID displayed in the receivers display. Max 16 numeric or 11 alphanumeric characters.

to.name: to
to.description: The number of your recipient(s) separated by comma. Can be regular numbers or contact/groups from seven.
to.natural_language_description: 参数名: To | 作用: The number of your recipient(s) separated by comma. Can be regular numbers or contact/groups from seven. | (必填项)

message.name: message
message.description: The message to send. Max. 1520 characters
message.natural_language_description: 参数名: Message | 作用: The message to send. Max. 1520 characters | (必填项)

options.name: options
options.natural_language_description: 参数名: Options | 默认值: {}
available_options: from (值: None) - The caller ID. Please use only verified sender IDs, one of your virtual inbound numbers or one of our shared virtual numbers.
